ItemBGDesc: The king of soft drinks, rough around the edges but good for your buddies â€” give 'em the strong kick they deserve.\n\n"A big barrel of pure caramel, a few jumping peas here and there, a handful of fresh canterbury bells, and some interdimensional leaves. Don't forget a drop of Ambergris of Abundance and a few rolls of orchid zest. How much of a kick you want is your choice."
